notes: After the third over, both the captains felt that the pitch was dangerous for the players to play on. The match referee then called off the match.

milestones.description: Romesh Kaluwitharana has broken the record for most ducks (14) in ODIs for SL, going past Mahanama's 13

stories.title: Unfinished business
stories.summary: Following the farce at the Sir Viv Richards Stadium, we look at other matches that have ended prematurely
